job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to enhancing or refining an AI system, which falls under the scope of model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions participation in fine-tuning AI models, which is a core aspect of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies directly relates to exploring and adapting models and techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI capabilities into a broader system for customer support, which implies software development to bridge human expertise and AI.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short

classification.rationale: The role focuses on improving AI systems through fine-tuning and integrating AI capabilities into customer support solutions. While not explicitly mentioning LLMs or RAG, the emphasis on 'AI model fine-tuning' and 'improving the AI system' aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
